titles.title: The God that Takes Me Through

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sometimes when I'm in trouble
I can't see what's going on
clouds are all around me
i can't even see the sun
and then i start to wondering
now what am i gonna do
lord help me know for certain
you are the god that takes me through

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are the God , the God that takes me through //
In the middle of the darkness,
a light comes shining through
you are God, the God that takes me through

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In the middle of the battle,
It's so very hard to see
What's going on around me
Or what you're doing in me
But in the middle of the darkenss
a light comes shining through
and then i know for certain
you are the god that takes me through
